servinfo.title: Camshaft Position (CMP) Sensor Removal and Installation

s1.ptxt: Remove injector cover referring to Cylinder Head Cover Removal and Installation:For F9Q Engine .
Remove CMP sensor (1) from generator upper bracket support.

servinfosub.title: Installation
servinfosub.ptxt: Reverse removal procedure for installation noting the following.

item.ptxt: Clean CMP sensor and protrusion of camshaft pulley before installation.
Tighten throttle body to EGR valve pipe to specified torque.

torqueitem.t-part: Throttle body to EGR valve pipe
